UNIVERSITY of PENNSYLVANIA
PHILADELPHIA 4
THE ANNENBERG SCHOOL
OF COMMUNICATIONS
January 21, 1960
Harry J. Skornia, President
Nat’l. Ass’n. of Ed. Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
If I can be of any service on the
Research Committee of the NAEB, I shall be
glad to serve.
Thanks for asking me.
Cordially,
Charles F. Hoban
Professor
CFH:pgp
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
JAN 2 5 1960
